summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for, the construction and acquisition of the steel or cast iron main from Volunteer Park Reservoir to a connection with the Queen Anne Standpipes, out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as one of the additions and betterments to, and extensions of the existing water works system contemplated by Ordinance No. 52260, as amended by Ordinance No. 55300, and authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
